content.rendered:
Directed by Siva

Written by G. Adi Narayana. Siva. Manikandan K.. Chandran Pachamuthu. Anthony Bhagyaraj. Savari Muthu. Siva. Rafi Warsi

Cast Ajith Kumar (Thookudurai). Nayanthara (Niranjana). Jagapathi Babu (Gautham Veer). Anikha Surendran (Swetha). Vivek (Kesavan). Thambi Ramaiah (Rosamani (as Thambi Ramayya)). Robo Shankar (Merit). Kovai Sarala (Filomina). Yogi Babu (Velu) . Sakshi Agarwal (Niranjana’s colleague).Darbha Appaji Ambarisha. Ravi Awana (D’Souza). Joy Badlani (Sivu).Bagya Sri.Gayatri Bhargavi. Saloni Umesh Burde (Neha).Chandrashekhar.Chanthiran.Chenthu.Vella Pandi Devar.Baby Dhansika. Ramachandran Durairaj (Police constable). Papri Ghosh (Priya).Bobbry Ghoshal. Mime Gopi (Aavudaiyappan).Sandhya Janak. Hello Kanthasamy (Police constable).Mumait Khan.Meena Kumari. Narayan Lucky (Niranjana’s colleague). Jangiri Madhumitha (Thookudurai’s cousin).Mahendira Mani. R.N.R. Manohar (Thookudurai’s uncle). George Maryan (Police inspector).Mathumitha. Namo Narayana (Thookudurai’s friend). Ravi Prakash (Gautham’s personal assistant). Rajitha (Thookudurai’s aunt). Sampath Ram (Kozhimuthu’s Aide).Ramachandiran. Meesai Ramesh (Villager). Kalai Rani (Pechiammal). Bharath Reddy (Swetha’s coach).Sakshi.Sanjana.Sarath.Seeniyammal.Chandra Sekhar. Shakeel Shamaail (Thookudurai’s Village Relative).Siddharth. Sujatha Sivakumar (Thookudurai’s aunt). T.M. Karthik Srinivasan ((as T.M. Karthik)).Sujatha. O.A.K. Sunder (Kozhimuthu). Sharmila Thapa (Niranjana’s colleague).Thappa. Ramesh Thilak (Thookudurai’s friend). Temper Vamsi (Corporate official). Surekha Vani (Gautham’s wife). Meena Vasu ((as Meena))

Languages Tamil

Producers Raahul. G. Saravanan. Arjun Thyagarajan. Sendhil Thyagarajan

Production Sathya Jyothi Film. Goldmines Telefilm
